mapper.select: SELECT m.id, m.title, t.thumbName thumbNail FROM Movie m LEFT JOIN ThumbNail t ON m.id = t.movieId ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT m.id, m.title, m.content, t.thumbName thumbNail FROM Movie m LEFT JOIN ThumbNail t ON m.id = t.movieId WHERE m.id = #{movieId}
SELECT a.name FROM Cast c JOIN Actor a ON c.actorId = a.id JOIN Movie m ON c.movieId = m.id WHERE c.movieId = #{movieId}
SELECT k.kate Kategorie FROM Movie m JOIN Kategorie k ON m.id = k.movieId WHERE k.movieId = #{movieId}
